title: TIC-Integrated Instructional Design for Enhancing Leadership Competencies of Higher Education Administrators

context.additional_context: Targeting corporate training managers over 40, aiming to enhance TIC-based instructional design and operational competencies in higher education. Digital devices are provided, but TIC experience is limited.

learning_goals: Learners can design team-based learning activities using digital collaboration tools (e.g., Padlet, Google Workspace).
Learners can propose three or more TIC-integrated strategies to enhance engagement in LMS-based asynchronous classes.
Design formative assessment tools for TIC-integrated curricula and implement feedback systems.

resources: Educational TIC (Technology, Instruction, Content) Guidelines eBook

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
